text: Agios Ilias (, also Άγιος Ηλίας Λετρίνων - Agios Ilias Letrinon) is a village and community in the municipality of Pyrgos in western Elis, Greece. It was an independent community from 1919 until 1997. ==See also== *List of settlements in Elis ==References== ==External links== * Page of the Agios Ilias settlement Category:Populated places in Elis
title: Agios Ilias, Pyrgos
